name: ctMigrateConfigData
description: Use this task to migrate config data between environments
author: cloudThing Ltd
helpMarkDown: You specify the name of the config entity, and the view that contains the records and fields you want to copy over.  You can also choose whether to create/upsert/etc the records.  It creates the records in the target environment with the same GUID as the target.

inputs.name: sourceOrg
inputs.label: Source Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the source organisation where the access team templates are mastered. Ensure you use the 'RequireNewInstance' parameter!

inputs.name: targetOrg
inputs.label: Target Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the target organisation where the access team templates are to be copied. Ensure you use the 'RequireNewInstance' parameter!

inputs.name: entityName
inputs.label: Entity Schema Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: THe schema name of the entity to be copied

inputs.name: viewName
inputs.label: View Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the view we should use to get the source data (must be a system view)
